Package controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that provides the logic to modify a product Allows the user to modify a preexisting product and checks that the information is valid
Author:
Corey --- RUNTIME ERROR --- One of the errors that I encountered when creating the program was related to the Products' modification screen. If the product had no parts associated with it, there were no issues. However, when the product had associated parts already linked to it, issues occurred. If the button was pushed, all the parts already associated with it would repopulate themselves and would constantly be added to the associated parts table. If it had 3 parts already associated with it, those same 3 would re-add themselves. Same if it was just two parts. To fix this, I had to add a this.product = product to have the button call only the current product. That fixed the issue.
